title: Analysis of the Effectiveness of Free-Viewing-Based Multimedia Mathematics Learning Materials Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic math concepts and ability to solve secondary-level math problems
context.additional_context: Analysis of learning effects based on the combination of visual and text elements in a smartphone-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the optimal combination of visual elements and text in multimedia materials they freely access
Learners can understand and apply cognitive load measurement methods using EEG brainwave and eye-tracking data
Learners can propose improvement strategies considering learners' emotional responses (interest/fatigue) when designing multimedia learning materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
